title: Emotional Flower
detail: A robotic flower that responds to the overall mood of the room
extended_details:
We propose building essentially a robotic flower that reacts to the tone of voice (angry, neutral, pleased) of the users around it, either blooming or wilting depending on the mood. The flower itself will be CAD-designed & 3D printed, have an embedded microphone and contain small actuators that give it the behavior. These actuators will be controlled by an arduino at the base of the flower.  To detect overall mood of the room, we will classify the strongest frequencies present in peoples' voices using simple thresholds or a more complex weighting or learning algorithm.  An ARM-based Teensy 3.2 board will run an FFT on the microphone output, which will then be classified onboard as a tone of voice.  The Teensy will send this information to the Arduino to change the flower state.

Github repo here: https://github.com/jmaccarl/Build-18-2016-Emotional_Flower
